titleStmt.title: The trauellers breuiat, or, An historicall description of the most famous kingdomes in the world relating their situations, manners, customes, ciuill gouernment, and other memorable matters. / Translated into English.
Relazioni universali. English
titleStmt.author: Botero, Giovanni, 1540-1617.
Johnson, Robert, fl. 1586-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Edm. Bollifant, for Iohn Iaggard,

notesStmt.note: Translator's dedication signed: I.R., i.e. Robert Johnson; a variant has translator's name spelled out.
Title page has printers' device (McK. & Ferg. 293).
Errata on A3v, final printed leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
